text:
When having a single virtualhost with a

  <Location "/servlets">
    JkUriSet worker ajp13:localhost:11143
  </Location>

this path leads to Tomcat just fine. However, when I have another virtualhost in
addition that has a 

  <Location "/servlets">
    JkUriSet worker ajp13:localhost:11144
  </Location>

both virtualhosts now connect to the worker at port 11144
creator: niklas@registrar.no

text:
I can't test right now, but if I had to guess, I would say this is a Tomcat
connector bug.
creator: slive@apache.org
slive@apache.org
text:
Since nobody over here seems to have any ideas, why don't you take this to
a Tomcat mailing list and see if they can help.
Ok, I'll have a chat with them. Thanks
creator: niklas@registrar.no
